firstNightReminder: Show 1 in-play Townsfolk; mark that player as 'Can't die'
otherNightReminder: If madness is broken, remove the 'Can't die' reminder token
name: Mimic
ability: You start knowing 1 in-play Townsfolk. If you were mad that you were this character, they can't die at night.

firstNightReminder: Let them choose a Townsfolk & Minion character; If the Townsfolk lives, mark both 'Drunk'
otherNightReminder: Let them choose a Townsfolk & Minion character; If the Townsfolk lives, mark both 'Drunk'
name: Matchmaker
ability: Each night, choose a Townsfolk & Minion character. If the Townsfolk lives, both are drunk until dusk.

firstNightReminder: Let them point to a player (not themselves) and mark them 'Chosen'
otherNightReminder: Let them point to a player (not themselves) and mark them 'Chosen'; nod ("Yes") if exactly 1 of this 'Chosen' player and the previous 'Chosen' player is a Townsfolk, else shake your head ("No")
name: Artificer
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): learn if exactly 1 of tonight and last night's choices is a Townsfolk.
attribution: This is the Sorcerer from Gobinator's Potato Patch (removing the restriction to only choose unique players).

firstNightReminder: Let them point to two players (not themselves); if one of them is a Minion or Demon, show their character; else, show a not-in-play Minion or Demon character
otherNightReminder: Let them point to two players (not themselves); if one of them is a Minion or Demon, show their character; else, show a not-in-play Minion or Demon character
name: Seer
ability: Each night, choose 2 players (not yourself): learn 1 evil character of a chosen player (else not-in-play).
attribution: This is the Palm Reader from Gobinator's Potato Patch (letting them choose 2 players instead of 3, and prohibiting to choose themselves).

otherNightReminder: Show them a number equal to the number of nominations that were cast today between players of opposite alignments
name: Scholar
ability: Each night*, learn how many of today's nominations were made between different alignments.
attribution: This is the Cross-examiner from Gobinator's Potato Patch (adding *of today's* for clarity).

otherNightReminder: Let them point to any number of players (not themselves) and mark them 'Can't die'; if any of them is evil, place all reminder tokens sideways to signal that they are not protected at night, but can still trigger an execution of the Vanguard
name: Vanguard
ability: Each night*, choose any number of players (not yourself): if all are good, they can't die tonight. If 1 is executed tomorrow, you are instead.

otherNightReminder: If the player marked 'Predicted' has died tonight, show their character
name: Astrologer
ability: Each day, you may publicly choose a player. If they die tonight, learn their character.

firstNightReminder: Let them choose a number; if they choose 1, show them a non-Townsfolk player
otherNightReminder: On their chosen night X, show them X non-Townsfolk players
name: Spelunker
ability: You start by choosing a number X. On night X, learn X non-Townsfolk players. [+0 or +1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: If they were executed today, put the 'Townsfolk can't die' reminder token in the center of the Grimoire
name: Martyr
ability: If you are executed, Townsfolk can't die tonight.

name: Paragon
ability: If you are executed by a player of your alignment, they are instead.

otherNightReminder: If they were executed today, show them a number equal to the number of evil votes, plus 1 if the nominator was evil
name: Warden
ability: If you are executed by nomination, tonight, learn how many evil players voted for and nominated you.
attribution: This is the Pidgeonkeeper from Gobinator's Potato Patch (slightly reworded).

otherNightReminder: If they were executed today in someone's stead, show their character
name: Hero
ability: If you are executed in someone's stead, learn their character tonight. On day #{base Minions}, if a Townsfolk or Minion is executed, you are instead.

otherNightReminder: If a player has nominated and executed someone, mark them 'Can't die'
name: Justiciar
ability: The last player to nominate & execute a player can't die at night.

otherNightReminder: If they have died, show the Demon the Grimoire
name: Archivist
ability: If you die, the Demon sees the Grimoire.

otherNightReminder: If they have died at night, turn their character token upside-down; while their killer is still awake, wake them to let their eyes meet, then show them a thumbs down to indicate they are evil
name: Ghoul
ability: If you die at night, you wake & become evil.

otherNightReminder: If the Dryad or the Townsfolk player marked 'Drunk' dies, mark a living Townsfolk neighbor 'Drunk'
name: Dryad
ability: While you are dead, a living Townsfolk neighbor is drunk.

otherNightReminder: Wake all Minions and let them choose 2 players: mark them 'Die'; if the Vessel died, wake a Minion and show them 'This character selected you', then the Vessel character token, then show then any Demon character they become
name: Vessel
ability: Good can't win if a Minion lives. Each night*, Minions wake to choose 2 players: they die. If you die, a Minion becomes the Demon. [No Demon, +1 Minion]

firstNightReminder: Let them choose 2 players disjoint to last night and mark them with 'Tricked'
otherNightReminder: Let them choose 2 players disjoint to last night and mark them with 'Tricked'
name: Illusionist
ability: Each night, choose 2 living players (disjoint to last night): tomorrow, if 1 is executed, the other is instead.

otherNightReminder: If at most 1 player died, let them choose a player and mark them 'Die'
name: Shade
ability: Each night*, if at most 1 player died, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not.

otherNightReminder: If they were executed today, put the 'Townsfolk are poisoned' reminder token in the center of the Grimoire
name: Changeling
ability: If you are executed, all Townsfolk are poisoned until dusk. On the final day, at dawn, swap characters with the Demon.
attribution: This is the Mothborne from Gobinator's Potato Patch (slightly rewritten).

name: Heir
ability: The 1st time a player publicly claiming to be the Heir is executed, a good player is instead (not on the final day). If you die at night, regain this ability.
attribution: This is *strongly* inspired on the Heir of The Dark Artist.

otherNightReminder: Let them choose two characters and mark them 'Die'; if neither is in play, mark their living neighbord 'Die'
name: Beholder
ability: Each night*, choose 2 characters: they die. If neither is in play, your living neighbors die.

otherNightReminder: Let them each choose a player and mark them 'Die'
name: Dvati
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If the other Dvati is executed, you are instead. [1 Minion is a Dvati]

otherNightReminder: Let them choose two players and mark the first one 'Die'; if the second one has a different character type w.r.t. the first, mark them 'Die' as well
name: Chimera
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: the 1st dies. If they're different character types, both do. [X or X+1 Outsiders if X Minions]

otherNightReminder: Let them choose 2 players sitting their chosen number X from each other and mark them 'Die'; on their chosen night X, put the 'Townsfolk are poisoned' reminder token in the center of the Grimoire
name: Sphinx
ability: You start by choosing a number X. Each night*, choose 2 players sitting X steps from each other: they die. On night & day X, all Townsfolk are poisoned.

name: Guillotine
ability: Players can only be executed in someone’s stead if the original execution was caused by a nomination.
